data.eml:eml: New records, new genera, and new species in Acanthocinini (Lamiinae) from the Neotropical region, and new synonym in Cerambycinae (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A., Nascimento, Francisco E. De L., Monné, Marcela L., Santos-Silva, Antonio (2019): New records, new genera, and new species in Acanthocinini (Lamiinae) from the Neotropical region, and new synonym in Cerambycinae (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae). Zootaxa 4624 (4): 491-506, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4624.4.3
